original_text: So I tell you this. You should not worry about how to stay alive. Do not worry about the food and drink that you need. Do not worry about the clothes that you need to wear. Your life is more important than the food that you eat. Your body is more important than your clothes.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 이르노니 목숨을 위하여 무엇을 먹을까 무엇을 마실까 몸을 위하여 무엇을 입을까 염려하지 말라 목숨이 음식보다 중하지 아니하며 몸이 의복보다 중하지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: You should not worry about how to stay alive
Do not worry about the food and drink that you need
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 필요로 하는 음식과 마실 것에 대해 염려하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not worry about the clothes that you need to wear
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 입어야 할 옷에 대해 염려하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Your life is more important than the food that you eat
sentences.korean_translation: 네 생명은 네가 먹는 음식보다 더 중요하다

sentences.original_text: Your body is more important than your clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 네 몸은 네 옷보다 더 중요하다
